name: Titans of Ealuh
description:
The titans have began to stir, and only by capturing and training Splinters can you put a stop to it!

Made for the Revival jam this is a blind accessible Game!

Controls:

Enter opens main menu

X - Select

Z - Go back from most menus

Selecting the "escape" option in the main menu (opened with Enter) will heal your monsters and take you back to the last spot. Also can save through there

Use arrow keys to navigate window, going left will progress your adventure, looking to the right will allow you to interact with what is at a location that didn't already attack you.

After the first area, you can access monster storage from the starting zone. 

Text to speech

F1: toggles the text to speech voice on and off

F2: Slows down the text to speech voice

F3: Speeds up the text to speech voice

Ctrl: clears TTS queue

Shift: Give additional information in battle through text to speech

In the beginning, the titans governed this world, bending the elements to their wills and whims.

With each breath, they created: first, buildings of great stature, then new life.

Like splinters from a great tree, their children split from their bodies.

And once the children were grown, like all good parents, the titans stepped away...

...To let their heirs inherit what they made.

But the splinters craved companionship above all else...

And so they sought friends of skin and bone.

And the titans slept as their buildings fell to ruin, leaving only hints of what once was

They are sleeping still

Until...

THE STORY:

For the Revival jam this is my fourth try to make a blind accessible game in this style! 

This is my best attempt, but it's pretty unbalanced still, and the text to speech doesn't cover all the use cases. But there are still dozens of monsters to see, so I hope it's fun!
